arts.ttl: Bischof rescues point for Hoffenheim in thrilling draw with Freiburg
arts.sum: Hoffenheim and Freiburg had to make do with a share of the points after they traded excellent goals - first from Matthias Ginter and then Tom Bischof - in a hotly contested and entertaining 1-1 draw at PreZero Arena on Matchday 13. Freiburg's Michael Gregoritsch tested the veteran keeper in the third minute with a low shot, setting the tone for a competitive half.

arts.ttl: Bischof strike ensures Hoffenheim and Freiburg share the spoils
arts.sum: SC Freiburg made the trip to face TSG Hoffenheim as they sought to bounce back from their shock Pokal exit midweek. In the end, neither club could find a winner as it finished in a 1-1 draw.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Freiburg preview: Visitors looking for strong away performance
arts.sum: Freiburg will be looking to end a four-game winless away run in all competitions when they travel to the PreZero Arena for Sunday's clash with Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
